this_title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver Season 5
trans_title: 约翰·奥利弗上周今夜秀 第五季
introduction: Breaking news, on a weekly basis. Comedian John Oliver satirically covers the week in news, politics and current events in this Emmy-winning variety series. Watch it Sundays at 11 pm ET or stream new episodes at 12 am ET.
